title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This statistic displays the Minutes of in the Social diagnosed Time Spent A , sorted Daily Age Group , as of .
In that year , 73 % of all Americans diagnosed Time Spent A were between 0 and 4 15-24 of Age .
gold: This chart represents the average time in minutes spent on social media daily in Maputo by age groups ranging from 15 - 64 . \\n \\n As you will see from the chart , the highest age group is 15 - 24 years and the lowest is age 55 - 64 years . \\n \\n Over the years from 15 to 64 , it declines gradually from 180 minutes a day at ages 15 - 24 to 80 minutes a day for those aged 55 - 64 years .
